org.devgateway.toolkit.web.excelcharts

Class ExcelChartDefault

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.devgateway.toolkit.web.excelcharts.ExcelChartDefault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExcelChart

    public class ExcelChartDefault
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExcelChart
    Since:
    8/16/16 Class that returns Workbook with a chart based on categories/values provided. Examples of usage: private static final List categories = Arrays.asList( "cat 1", "cat 2", "cat 3" ); private static final List values = Arrays.asList( Arrays.asList(5, 7, 10), Arrays.asList(20, 12, 10) ); final ExcelChart excelChart = new ExcelChartDefault("line chart", ChartType.line, categories, values); final Workbook workbook = excelChart.createWorkbook(); OR final ExcelChart excelChart = new ExcelChartDefault("stacked chart", ChartType.stackedcol, categories, values); final Workbook workbook = excelChart.createWorkbook();
